name: get_the_timezones
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool location.
Tool description: Get the locations using a REST API simple and free.
API description: Fetches the list of timezones from the specified RapidAPI service.

page.description: The page number of the results to retrieve. Defaults to '1'.

name.description: The name filter to apply to the timezones. Defaults to None.
